alert.note: Alert for Clark; Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:49PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Clark and southwestern Taylor Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 544 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Owen, or 13 miles west of Medford, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. Hourly rainfall rates 1 to 4 inches. Perkinstown reported 4 inches of rain during the past hour. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Street flooding. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Owen around 640 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
